database_id.title: Recombee Database ID
database_id.description: The ID of your Recombee database (e.g., 'your-database-id').

#private_token.title: Recombee Private Token
#private_token.description: The private token used to authenticate requests to Recombee.

region.title: Region
region.description: Region where your Recombee database is hosted.

scenario.title: Scenario
scenario.description: The recommendation scenario to be used (e.g., 'homepage', 'related-items').

endpoint.title: Recommendation Endpoint
endpoint.description: Which Recombee endpoint to use when fetching recommendations.

count.title: Number of Recommendations
count.description: How many recommended items to fetch per user or item.

batch_size.title: Batch Size
batch_size.description: Number of users or items to fetch recommendations for in a single batch.
